title: Gordon Ramsay's Malaysian Chicken Curry
summary: Gordon Ramsay's Malaysian Chicken Curry takes around 26 minutes from beginning to end. One serving contains 498 calories, 26g of protein, and 34g of fat. This recipe serves 6. For $2.54 per serving, this recipe covers 22% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. A few people really liked this main course. 61 person have tried and liked this recipe. If you have chicken stock, shallots, onions, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the oil you could follow this main course with the Olive Oil Pistachio Biscotti as a dessert. This recipe is typical of Indian cuisine. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and dairy free diet. It is brought to you by Food.com. Overall, this recipe earns a solid spoonacular score of 69%.
